例句: I go to school by car. 我坐汽车去上学。
The bus is coming. 公共汽车来了。
I ride a bike. 我骑自行车。
The train is fast. 火车很快。
The plane flies high. 飞机飞得很高。
It's sunny today. 今天天气晴朗。
It's rainy outside. 外面在下雨。
It's cloudy now. 现在多云。
It's very windy. 风很大。
It's snowy in winter. 冬天会下雪。
I like to run. 我喜欢跑步。
I can jump high. 我可以跳得很高。
I swim in summer. 我夏天游泳。
Let's play football. 我们踢足球吧。
I play basketball. 我打篮球。
My mother is a teacher. 我妈妈是老师。
The doctor is kind. 这位医生很和蔼。
She is a nurse. 她是护士。
The farmer works hard. 农民工作很辛苦。
My father is a driver. 我爸爸是司机。
